sn35.168:1.1: “Yaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ, tatra vo chando pahātabbo.
sn35.168:1.3: Cakkhu, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ; tatra vo chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn35.168:1.4: jivhā aniccā; tatra vo chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn35.168:1.5: mano anicco; tatra vo chando pahātabbo.
sn35.168:1.6: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ, tatra vo chando pahātabbo”ti.
